contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|phylacteries|phylactery}} '''Phylactery''' may refer to: * An [[amulet]] or [[spell (paranormal)|charm]]; worn for its [[magical]] or [[supernatural]] power. * A [[speech scroll]] that contains dialogue in mediaeval art, a precursor to the [[speech balloon]]. == Fantasy == * An object used by a [[Lich (Dungeons & Dragons)|Lich]] to contain its soul, protecting it from death :* ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]'' fantasy role-playing game :* ''[[World of Warcraft]]'' :* ''[[Magic: the Gathering]]'' * In ''[[Dragon Age]]'', the [[Bioware]]-created RPG series, a vial of a mage's blood which the Templars use to track the mage == History == * English name for [[Tefillin]], a pair of small, black, leather boxes containing scrolls of parchment inscribed with verses from the Torah, which are worn by observant Jews during weekday morning prayers == Music == * ''[[Phylactery Factory]]'', the second album by American singer-songwriter Casey Dienel, but the first under the White Hinterland name {{disambig}}
